Handling strangers\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees, Security guards must not allow any strangers (including EPAM employees who are not Bridgewater Malaga members) to enter Bridgewater Malaga premises.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a stranger requests entrance, politely explain that they are not welcome to have an access. If this person does not accept this, inform ODC Infrastructure support team or Security guard.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you see any strangers walking around the Bridgewater Malaga premises, confront them and ask them: “How can I help you?”. If they are not supposed to be in the office, please contact a member of the ODC Infrastructure support team or Security guard, or escort them off the premises.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not allow tailgating.\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://videoportal.epam.com/video/ZoDx1koO\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://videoportal.epam.com/video/ZoDx1koO\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
